textcomponents:
VTP Modes and Concepts

Drag and drop the appropriate word or phrase to complete the sentences. Not all answers are used. Some answers may be used more than once. Layer 2 server Open-source VLAN trunking protocol 5 transparent translation proprietary Virtual trunking protocol client Layer 3 master VTP is an acronym for __________________ . VTP is a __________ messaging protocol that maintains VLAN configuration consistency by managing the addition, deletion, and renaming of VLANs across multiple Cisco switches in a network. VTP is a __________ protocol available only on Cisco switches. In VTP _________ mode, you can create, modify, and delete VLANs for the entire VTP domain. In VTP ____________ mode, the switch does not participate in VTP. However, the switch does forward VTP adverstisements through trunk interfaces. In VTP _____________ mode, you cannot create, change, or delete VLANs. In VTP ____________ mode, VLAN configurations are not saved in NVRAM. VTP ______________ mode allows you to create, modify, and delete VLANs on the single switch without affecting the rest of the switches in your network. VTP _____________ mode is the default mode for a Cisco switch. Reset Check Completed You have completed this activity.
